name: Work & Business
description: Professional illustrations perfect for business presentations, blog posts, and workplace documentation. Includes office scenes, devices, and business concepts.

name: People & Characters
description: Human figures and character illustrations for diverse representation in your projects. Perfect for user personas, team pages, and social content.

name: Objects & Items
description: Everyday objects, tools, and items that add context to your designs. From coffee cups to office supplies, find the perfect supporting element.
